name: AtomiConverge
description:
Carrying charge with you is a pain! You need to be stable, be charge-free, be neutral, be stable!

In AtomiConverge, you play as a Proton/ an Electron both a Proton and an Electron (!) in an atom, who needs to get past different obstacles to neutralize themselves, and become a neutral Neutron!

And... that Neutron is not free yet! There may be something for him as well!

Controls

Move: Right/Left, A/D

Jump: Up, W, Space

*coughs*theneutroncanjumphigher*coughs*
